title: 随着印度增强科技雄心，Reliance 推出 110B 美元人工智能投资计划
content: Reliance 已开始在贾姆讷格尔建设数千兆瓦的人工智能数据中心，预计将于 2026 年上线超过 120 兆瓦的容量。
original_title: Reliance unveils $110B AI investment plan as India ramps up tech ambitions
original_content: Reliance has begun building multi-gigawatt AI data centers in Jamnagar, with more than 120 MW of capacity expected to come online in 2026.

title: 出于安全担忧，Meta 和其他科技公司限制 OpenClaw 的使用
content: 安全专家敦促人们对这种病毒性人工智能工具保持谨慎，该工具以功能强大但也非常难以预测而闻名。
original_title: Meta and Other Tech Firms Put Restrictions on Use of OpenClaw Over Security Fears
original_content: Security experts have urged people to be cautious with the viral agentic AI tool, known for being highly capable but also wildly unpredictable.

title: 从整合混乱到数字清晰：Nutrien Ag Solutions 的收购后重置
content: 感谢您加入我们的“企业人工智能中心”。在印孚瑟斯知识学院播客的这一集中，Dylan Cosper 与澳大利亚 Nutrien Ag Solutions 的应用程序和数据主管 Sriram Kalyan 讨论了如何将高风险的收购后 IT 环境转变为可扩展的解决方案

title: 能力出现的剖析：神经网络中的尺度不变表示崩溃和自上而下的重组
content:

original_title: Anatomy of Capability Emergence: Scale-Invariant Representation Collapse and Top-Down Reorganization in Neural Networks
original_content:
arXiv:2602.15997v1 Announce Type: new 
Abstract: Capability emergence during neural network training remains mechanistically opaque. We track five geometric measures across five model scales (405K-85M parameters), 120+ emergence events in eight algorithmic tasks, and three Pythia language models (16

title: Nvidia 与 Meta 的交易标志着计算能力的新时代
content: 科技巨头购买分立芯片的时代已经结束。人工智能公司现在需要 GPU、CPU 以及介于两者之间的一切。
original_title: Nvidia’s Deal With Meta Signals a New Era in Computing Power
original_content: The days of tech giants buying up discrete chips are over. AI companies now need GPUs, CPUs, and everything in between.

title: DevDay 发布的 AMA
content: 这是历史上成为建设者的最好时代。在 DevDay 2025 上，我们推出了下一代工具和模型，以帮助开发人员更快地编码、更可靠地构建代理并扩展他们的应用程序

title: 据报道 OpenAI 以超过 850B 估值完成 100B 美元交易
content: 据报道，OpenAI 即将完成一项价值 1000 亿美元的交易，支持者包括亚马逊、Nvidia、软银和微软。这笔交易将使 ChatGPT 制造商的估值达到 8500 亿美元。
original_title: OpenAI reportedly finalizing $100B deal at more than $850B valuation
original_content: OpenAI is reportedly getting close to closing a $100 billion deal, with backers including Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank, and Microsoft. The deal would value the ChatGPT-maker at $850 billion.

title: OpenAI 与 Pine Labs 金融科技合作伙伴关系深化印度业务
content: OpenAI 通过与 Pine Labs 达成的一项针对企业支付和人工智能驱动的商务的交易，超越了印度的 ChatGPT。
original_title: OpenAI deepens India push with Pine Labs fintech partnership
original_content: OpenAI moves beyond ChatGPT in India with a Pine Labs deal targeting enterprise payments and AI-driven commerce.

title: 编辑部
content: Sonnet 4.6 在编码、代理和大规模专业工作方面提供前沿性能。正在升级我们最智能的模型。在代理编码、计算机使用、工具使用、搜索和金融领域，Opus 4.6 是一个行业领先的模型，通常遥遥领先。我们已经做出选择，克劳德将继续留任
